trans-unit.source: Defines a static <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig.Write*> method that creates a client remoting configuration file for a client type library.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un valore statico <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig.Write*>metodo che crea un file di configurazione remota per una libreria dei tipi di client.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig.Write*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig.Write%2A> method is used by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class while generating a COM interface from a client type library (with a .tlb extension).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig.Write%2A>metodo viene utilizzato il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>classe durante la generazione di un'interfaccia COM da una libreria dei tipi di client (con estensione tlb).</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class publishes COM interfaces in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>classe pubblica COM (interfacce) in un'applicazione COM+ abilitato per SOAP.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: One of the method's parameters is the name of an assembly that contains common language runtime (CLR) metadata that <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> has already generated for the client type library.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei parametri del metodo è il nome di un assembly che contiene i metadati di common language runtime (CLR) che <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>è già stato generato per la libreria client.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig.Write%2A> does not need to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig.Write%2A>non è necessario essere chiamati direttamente.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.ProcessClientTlb%2A> method of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, chiamare il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.ProcessClientTlb%2A>metodo della <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>classe.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.ProcessClientTlb%2A>

trans-unit.source: ClientRemotingConfig is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: ClientRemotingConfig viene utilizzata internamente da .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the class directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: Non è necessario utilizzare la classe direttamente nel codice.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ClientRemotingConfig"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a client remoting configuration file for a client type library in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: Crea un file di configurazione remota per una libreria dei tipi di client in un'applicazione COM+ abilitato per SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The static Write method is called by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class while generating a COM interface from a client type library (with a .tlb extension).
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato il metodo statico di scrittura la <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>classe durante la generazione di un'interfaccia COM da una libreria dei tipi di client (con estensione tlb).</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class publishes COM interfaces in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>classe pubblica COM (interfacce) in un'applicazione COM+ abilitato per SOAP.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: Write does not need to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: Scrittura non è necessario essere chiamati direttamente.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.ProcessClientTlb%2A> method of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, chiamare il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.ProcessClientTlb%2A>metodo della <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>classe.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.ProcessClientTlb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `BaseUrl` and `VRoot` parameter values are concatenated (with a path separator, if needed) to form the client element's `URL` attribute value.
trans-unit.target: Il `BaseUrl` e `VRoot` vengono concatenati i valori dei parametri (con un separatore di percorso, se necessario) per l'elemento del client del form `URL` valore dell'attributo.

trans-unit.source: The `AssemblyName` parameter identifies an assembly containing CLR metadata that <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>, using the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata> class, has already generated for the client type library.
trans-unit.target: Il `AssemblyName` parametro identifica un assembly contenente metadati CLR che <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>, usando la <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata>classe, è già stato generato per la libreria client.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: The folder in which to create the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: La cartella in cui creare il file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della radice virtuale.

trans-unit.source: The base URL that contains the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: URL di base che contiene la radice virtuale.

trans-unit.source: The display name of the assembly that contains common language runtime (CLR) metadata corresponding to the type library.
trans-unit.target: Il nome visualizzato dell'assembly che contiene i metadati di common language runtime (CLR) corrispondente alla libreria dei tipi.

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the assembly that contains CLR metadata corresponding to the type library.
trans-unit.target: Il nome completo dell'assembly contenente metadati CLR corrispondente alla libreria dei tipi.

trans-unit.source: The programmatic identifier of the class.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore a livello di codice della classe.

trans-unit.source: The activation mode.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di attivazione.

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: Non utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: Specificare <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> per questo parametro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the client remoting configuration file was successfully created; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il file di configurazione remota è stato creato correttamente; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
